short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Click-to-Copy French accented characters that allow you to write French with just QWERTY

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
‚ö° French Accents is an indie Chrome extension that lets you copy French accents and symbols without the need to switch to AZERTY or memorize character combinations.

üî• Open source. Code is available at https://github.com/itsmais/french-accents
